actions.text: Unfavorable Executive Comment Received from USDA.

official_title: To treat tobacco grown in the United States and processed in a designated Caribbean Basin Country as eligible for duty-free entry.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to treat as duty-free any tobacco grown in the United States and processed in a Caribbean Basin country.

titles.title: To treat tobacco grown in the United States and processed in a designated Caribbean Basin Country as eligible for duty-free entry.
